Constructor for the Account Class

Parameters:
$IdThe account's 28 character string Identifier
$NameThe account's Name
$TypeThe Type of account. 0 = banned, 1 = normal, 2 = admin
$ValidatedWhether the account's email has been validated or not.
$CreatedOnTimestamp when the account was created
